actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4234 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 16.
Amendment SA 4234 proposed by Senator Scott FL for Senator Lee. To strike the earmark for the Community and Training Center by the New Immigrant Community Empowerment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4234 proposed by Senator Scott FL for Senator Lee.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4234 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 16.

purpose: To strike the earmark for the Community and Training Center by the New Immigrant Community Empowerment.
